title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 351-1.6 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 351-1.6 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part, or its application to any
person or circumstance is held to be invalid, the remainder of this Part, and
the application of that provision to other persons or circumstances, will not
be affected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
351-1.6

Adopted

New

York State Register February 26, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 08, eff. 3/14/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
